	./analyze.c
	./attach.c
	./auth.c
	./btree.c
	./build.c
	./callback.c
	./complete.c
	./date.c
	./delete.c
	./expr.c
	./func.c
	./hash.c
	./insert.c
	./legacy.c
	./main.c
	./opcodes.c
	./os.c
	./os_unix.c
	./os_win.c
	./pager.c
	./parse.c
	./pragma.c
	./prepare.c
	./printf.c
	./random.c
	./select.c
	./table.c
	./tclsqlite.c
	./tokenize.c
	./trigger.c
	./update.c
	./utf.c
	./util.c
	./vacuum.c
	./vdbe.c
	./vdbeapi.c
	./vdbeaux.c
	./vdbefifo.c
	./vdbemem.c
	./where.c
)
